title: fragment:sisters-5
content:
[[include :scp-wiki-cn:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]

[[module CSS]]
.email-example .collapsible-block-folded a.collapsible-block-link {
    animation: blink 0.8s ease-in-out infinite alternate;
}
@keyframes blink {
    0% { color: transparent; }
    50%, 100% { color: #b01; }
}
.email {border: solid 2px #000000; width: 88%; padding: 1px 15px; margin: 10px; box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.5)}
.email-example a.collapsible-block-link {font-weight: bold;}
.tofrom {margin-left: 10px; margin-top: 5px; padding: 1px 15px; border-left: solid 3px maroon}
[[/module]]

[[include :scp-wiki-cn:component:anomaly-class-bar-source
|lang =cn
|item-number= 6535
|clearance= 2
|container-class= 机密
|secondary-class= 未收容
|secondary-icon= https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/calibri-s-mega-cool-art-page-it-s-mostly-just-icons-but-what/Uncontained.svg
|disruption-class= dark
|risk-class= 待观察
]]
------------

[[include :scp-wiki-cn:component:image-block
| name= https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/fragment:sisters-5/Distant_person.jpg
| caption= SCP-6535
| width=100%]]

**特殊收容措施：**###ff1493|SCP-6535不应被打扰。##

**描述：**SCP-6535是一名亚洲血统的十七岁人类女性，目前未被收容。###ff1493|她漫游世界，不对任何人抱有恶意。##

**附录 6535.1：**###ff1493|翻我的旧手机时发现的。看起来像是唯一一个在我的重置之中幸存的东西。##


[[collapsible show="+ 显示图片" hide="- 隐藏"]]
[[=]]

| caption= 谢谢你。
| width=100%]]

author: joke3579
